description: COUNTRY PROGRAMME ACTION PLAN- GOVERNMENT OF ST. VINCENT AND THE GRENADINES: POVERTY REDUCTION

subproject.description:
The Multi-Country Programme Action Plan 2012-2016 for the countries of the sub-region identified the following key Programme Component Results under the Thematic area of Poverty Reduction.
1. Equitable and inclusive macro and sectoral national and sub-regional policies are developed based on integrated collection and analysis of relevant economic, social, environmental and other data and based on measures of poverty and human development that capture the multiple deprivations of vulnerable groups. This will include:
•	An integrated data framework for effective monitoring and evaluation and the development of inclusive, pro-poor policy.
•	National growth and poverty reduction strategies and regional policy documents in 10 countries that reflect poverty and social impact analysis and inform the equitable, annual allocation of national resources and collection of revenues.
2. MDG Acceleration Plans developed and implemented to respond to national development gaps as prioritized by countries, and including MDG and Caribbean MDG targets related to education and human capacity development for employment; poverty reduction and natural resource management.
3: As part of already underway social protection reform efforts in the region, innovative social protection measures developed that are linked to productive sectors including enterprise development, and that support inclusive growth and reduce vulnerability.
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: Country Programme Action Plan
